QuestData.Title: So Big, So Round...
QuestData.Description: <Pebble looks around, excited by something. After a few seconds of confusion, he stops and stares up at you with big, glowy gem eyes.>$B$BHug-nery... hungry...$B$B<Try as you might, there's no resisting those eyes. Maybe Kor knows what mini-mentals like to eat?>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kor to find out what kind of food Pebble might like.
QuestData.RewardText: You've made a friend, have you?$B$BAre you certain you want to feed him? He might become attached.
